featuredCode.description:
Primarily from a tutorial on kirupa.com, this little bit of CSS makes all images with the class responsive.
I added to the awesomeness by wrapping it in a media query, making only take effect on mobile devices.
I am using this code here on Triangle Land, it is works like a charm!

This small bit of jQuery simply gets the src attribute of the ie-svg class
and replaces it with a PNG image counterpart already on the server.
It works well for working around some of Internet Explorer's issues with SVG vector graphics.
